name: Froggo's Big Adventure
description:
Made for https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-106-frogs

My first ever game jam submission, this is a small project inspired by Frogger for PS1. I really liked how that game had small little "open" worlds vs just the arcade nature of the original game, so I wanted to make a 2d version of that. Objective is to get all 5 of the other frogs as fast as possible. Be wary, you only have 60 seconds per life!

WASD to move, menu controlled by mouse.

Music here: https://snabisch.itch.io/colors2
